name: Evil Frontier
description:
A Procedural Content Generation dungeon crawler for my personal project and thesis. The game is currently on v1.0 development build and will continue to update in the future after my thesis is done. 

The game comes with different procedurally generated dungeon with 4 different quest type with 3 different difficulty, 3 different variants in levels, RPG system, and three awesome bosses.

P.S  I would suggest turning down the volume before playing(not to 0 of course but not to loud lah luls).

P.S.S For my Thesis respondent here is the link, after you tried the game of course (in indonesian) https://tinyurl.com/XeaphenMauLulus
